name: Zupass Afternoon
description: Zupass is an experimental, open-source tool that allows you to make ZK proofs about your tickets. It's a project built by developers from the Devconnect and Zuzalu communities, and has been used to integrate Devconnect ticketing with Telegram, anonymous polls, anonymous chats, faucets, and more. Learn about what you can build on Zupass, and how you can use ZKPs to customize your Devconnect experience!
